Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.histogram

Visualizers based on 1D projected histograms.

See: Description


  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHistogramVisualization
    One-dimensional projected visualization.
    ColoredHistogramVisualizer<NV extends NumberVector<NV,?>>
    Generates a SVG-Element containing a histogram representing the distribution of the database's objects.
    ColoredHistogramVisualizer.Factory<NV extends NumberVector<NV,?>>
    Visualizer factory for 1D histograms
    ColoredHistogramVisualizer.Factory.Parameterizer<NV extends NumberVector<NV,?>>
    Parameterization class.
